mentions.candidate: Sam Cross, Leader of UKIP on Scarborough & Nth Yorks. Council, has over 10 years service. Sam campaigns on 'Stop the waste of Tax-payers money', 'Transparency in local government' 'The destruction of our heritage & the Futurist'. Sam has over 30 years in Insurance and Financial Services and was Chairman of Sun Life / AXA Staff Association.

politicalExperience.role: Leader of UKIP on Scarborough & Nth Yorks. Council
